text: I zapreshcheny vam vashi materi, i vashi docheri, i vashi sestry, i vashi tetki po ottsu i materi, i docheri brata, i docheri sestry, i vashi materi, kotoryye vas vskormili, i vashi sestry po kormleniyu, i materi vashikh zhen, i vashi vospitannitsy, kotoryye pod vashim pokrovitel'stvom ot vashikh zhen, k kotorym vy uzhe voshli; a yesli vy yeshche ne voshli k nim, to net grekha na vas; i zheny vashikh synovey, kotoryye ot vashikh chresel; i - ob"yedinyat' dvukh sester, yesli eto ne bylo ran'she. Poistine, Allakh proshchayushch, miloserd
